%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.text: By clicking on the Send Application for eSignature button below, you certify that all statements made in this application package (including supplemental documents) are true and correct to the best of your knowledge. You agree to the terms and conditions of the program set forth in this application. You understand that if any services performed or equipment intended to be used in connection with the proposed project listed on this appliction are ordedered, purchase or installed before written approval is received from Con Edison in the form of a Notice to proceed, the proposed project will not qualify for an incentive. You Also understand that your right to receive any incentive payment is conditioned upon the truth and accuracy of the representations and warranties you have given herein and your compliance with program requirements.
